sentence: Speculation that the Republican Party may be trying to purge Representative Madison Cawthorn from Congress has intensified after the North Carolina congressman was embroiled in yet another potential scandal.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Is Madison Cawthorn Being Purged by Republicans?
